sentences.en: Accurately and reliably in when move and stagnate, high efficiency and economic investment.
sentences.cn: 移动及停位准确可靠, 效率高,投资省.

sentences.en: Career development is faced with many predicaments, such as stagnate, discontinue and tiredness of career.
sentences.cn: 新时期女性职业发展面临着多重困境, 主要包括女性职业发展的停滞 、 业生涯的中断及职业厌倦等三个方面.

sentences.en: Compact Genetic Algorithm ( CGA ) a small amount of memory, but it is apt to premature stagnate.
sentences.cn: 紧凑遗传算法 ( CGA ) 具有存储成本低的优点, 但是其容易出现早熟.

sentences.en: Growth is expected to stagnate next year.
He didn't want to stagnate in his dull office job until he retired.
sentences.cn: 他不想停滞在枯燥乏味的办公室工作直到他退休.

sentences.en: If you allow your mind to stagnate, this particular talent will atrophy.
sentences.cn: 如果你老不用脑，那么这一特殊才能就会退化。

sentences.en: Industry will stagnate if we do not stimulate our economy.
sentences.cn: 如果我们不刺激我们的经济,工业就会停滞.

sentences.en: The unpardonable sin of nature is to stand still, to stagnate.
sentences.cn: 自然界最不可饶恕的罪行就是驻足不前, 淤滞停止.

sentences.en: These three reasons let the spread of axiomatic method stagnate for a long time.
sentences.cn: 正是这三个原因造成了当时公理化方法传播的停滞.

sentences.en: Thus Desch expects revenues and exports to'stagnate'next year, says Mr. Geilker.
sentences.cn: 因此盖尔克说,该公司预计明年的收益和出口额会停滞不前.

sentences.en: Where the masses are not roused, work will stagnate.
sentences.cn: 哪里不发动群众, 哪里的工作就死气沉沉.

sentences.en: Why do some firms grow while others stagnate?
sentences.cn: 为何有些企业会在其他企业处于萧条时成长?

words.tran_cn: 停滞的；不景气的；污浊的；迟钝的

trans.tran_en: to stop developing or making progress

trans.tran_cn: 停滞，不流动，不发展，变萧条
（使）（水等）停滞不流，（使）不动，（使）不活动，（使）迟钝，（使）不活泼，（使）变萧条
trans.tran_en: If something such as a business or society stagnates, it stops changing or progressing
